piranha305_animatedcounter.name: Animated Counter
piranha305_animatedcounter.description: A simple counter that animates from one number to another

updateInterval.name: Update Interval
updateInterval.desc: Update interval in milliseconds, how often the counter will update

stepSize.name: Step Size
stepSize.desc: how much to increment/decrement by each update tick

useBBCodeTemplate.name: Use BBCode Template
useBBCodeTemplate.desc: If true, the BBCode template will be used to format the number

bbcodeTemaplate.name: BBCode Template
bbcodeTemaplate.desc: The template for the BBCode, %v will be replaced with the counter value

SetBBCodeTemplate.description: Set the BBCode template to format the number

template.name: Template
template.desc: The template for the BBCode, %v will be replaced with the counter value

SetStepSize.description: Set the step size of the counter, the amount to increment or decrement by each tick

stepSize.name: Step Size
stepSize.desc: The step size of the counter

SetUopdateInterval.display-text: Set {my} Counter Update Interval to {0} milliseconds
SetUopdateInterval.description: Set the update interval of the counter, how often the counter will update in milliseconds

milliseconds.name: Milliseconds
milliseconds.desc: The speed the counter will update

SetUseBBCodeTemplate.description: Set if the BBCode template should be used to format the number

use.name: Use
use.desc: If true, the BBCode template will be used to format the number

SetTarget.description: Set the target value of the counter, this will start the animation

SetValue.description: Set the initial value of the counter, instantly

SetValueAndTarget.description: Set the initial value of the counter and the target value

ForceStop.description: Force stop the counter, set value to target

IsAnimating.description: Check if the counter is animating

IsDecreasing.description: Check if the counter is decreasing

IsIncreasing.description: Check if the counter is increasing

OnAnimationEnd.description: Triggered when the counter stops animating

OnAnimationStart.description: Triggered when the counter starts animating

StepSize.description: Get the step size of the counter

CurrentValue.description: Get the current value of the counter

Diff.description: Get the difference between the current and target value

TargetValue.description: Get the target value of the counter
